title: Mini-Ep 37: Bridesmaid Blues and Sex Talk
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 37: Bridesmaid Blues and Sex Talk
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kate and Doree hear from a woman who's torn about whether to ask a longtime friend to be her bridesmaid. They also give advice about how to enjoy sex more to a listener who's never had an orgasm, and get some more tips on how to ma...
description:
This week, Kate and Doree hear from a woman who's torn about whether to ask a longtime friend to be her bridesmaid. They also give advice about how to enjoy sex more to a listener who's never had an orgasm, and get some more tips on how to make your gym shower more pleasant.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. Visit forever35podcast.com for a complete list of products mentioned on this episode.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Brass. For a limited time, get 15% off your order at brassclothing.com — just enter the code FOREVER35 at checkout.
  • Living Proof. Visit LivingProof.com/FOREVER35 and use promo code FOREVER35 to get a free sample of their award-winning dry shampoo with your purchase.
  • Poshmark. Get $5 off your first purchase by using invite code doreesha when you sign up.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
